bugs.summary: Turn on the pref 'dom.media.mediasession.enabled' on Nightly

Implement the seek{back,for}ward in the MediaSession interface
Need to support CSS4 system colors
There are a couple of syntax errors in the WebIDL parser
Add better logging to process switching code
.webp not listed when accept="image/*"
Minor DirectionalityUtils cleanup
WindowRaised accesses mActiveWindow from a content process in test mode
Try out an arena-based allocator for DOM nodes again

HTTPS Only Mode - Basic implementation
Remove usage of GetURI in nsContentUtils.cpp

Complete implementation of Base Profiler on Android
Expand WebRender on Intel to medium screens
Add support for adding profiling event markers to WebRender
Unify the text and brush shader infrastructures

Support more JSOps in WarpBuilder

Checking for http proxy should compare only 4 characters?
Update Neqo to 0.2.2

Get rid of QuotaManager::EnsureStorageAndOriginIsInitialized

Crash in [@ std::io::stdio::_print]

Enable Eager evaluation in all channels
